title: What are some lingering effects of Reconstruction in your State? - Quora

response.answer_text: They are about all gone. The livestock herds and farm equipment numbers were at 1860 levels by 1900. The crippling tariff was abolished in 1913. All Southern State Reparations have been paid. Arkansas made the last payments in the 1950s. Exorbitant RR friegt rates were lowered to the Nation level in the 1950s. The Segragation imposed by the Union Army ended in the 1960s. The Generations that lived with Pelegra and other Vitamin deficiencies are now gone. The suffering of the Southern people has largely been forgotten, So the Yankees feel like they need to punish us again.

The official state song of Maryland is ““Maryland, My Maryland.” It was written at the beginning of the US Civil War. The song refers to President Lincoln as a tyrant and refers to Northern Union troops as “scum.” For as long as I can remember, there’s been talk about removing the song as Maryland’s official State song, but it’s still in place.
